name: Sophia ᴍᴜsɪᴄ
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

AUTO_LEAVING_ASSISTANT.description: If you want your assistant to leave all chats automatically after some time.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. You can use special characters bot ko jhaat farak ni padega get from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.get from @MissRose_bot user /id

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.get from @ssgenrobot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku account's API key get from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

PING_IMG_URL.description: The pic which will be shown when you give the /ping cmd to the bot.

START_IMG_URL.description: The pic which will be shown when you /start the bot in private.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify Client Id Get From developer.spotify.com.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify Client Secret Get From developer.spotify.com.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.
